system module¶

Created on Tue Feb 16 19:13:27 2021

@author: Nishad Mandlik

system._create_log_dir(logs_dir_path)[source]¶

Create the specified directory to store logs, if not already present

Parameters

logs_dir_path (str) – Path of the directory to store logs.

Returns

None.

system._get_iw_modes()[source]¶

Get the supported modes of operation for each wireless device.

Returns

A dictionary consisting of the phy IDs as the keys and a list of available modes as the values.

Return type

dict

system._get_monitor_compatible_ifs()[source]¶

Return a list of wireless interfaces that support monitor mode.

Returns

Names of interfaces which support monitor mode.

Return type

list

system._install_dep(pkg_name)[source]¶

Check is specified package is installed, and it not, install it via apt.

Parameters

pkg_name (str) – Name of the dependency to be checked.

Returns

None.

system.check(logs_dir_path=None)[source]¶

Check if necessary dependencies are met, install missing packages and select an interface for sniffing.

Parameters

logs_dir_path (str, optional) – Path of the directory to store logs. If None, the default path (USER_HOME/pysniff_logs) is used. Defaults to None.

Raises

RuntimeError – If no monitor-capable interface is found.

Returns

Tuple containing name of the interface selected for sniffing and path of the logs directory. If a custom path is supplied to the function, the same path is returned. If not supplied, the default path is returned.

Return type

tuple

system.get_iw_devs()[source]¶

Get the available wireless devices.

Returns

A dictionary consisting of the phy IDs as the keys and the interface names as the values.

Return type

dict
